meanings.sent1: Sh! Be quiet in the library.
meanings.sent2: Sh, don't disturb the sleeping baby.
meanings.sent3: Sh! The surprise party is a secret.
meanings.sent4: The sun sets with a gentle sh.
meanings.sent5: Sh! The ninja moves in silence.

meanings.definition: A sound made to show disapproval or disagreement.
meanings.sent1: The audience let out a loud sh of disapproval.
meanings.sent2: I heard a sh from the back of the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a little sh when I petted it.
meanings.sent4: The wind whispered with a soft sh.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's sh stopped the argument.

meanings.sent1: The rabbit will sh away from danger.
meanings.sent2: I saw the squirrel sh up the tree.
meanings.sent3: The ball sh across the field.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts sh from one idea to another.
meanings.sent5: The car will sh to a stop.
